name: Flutterwave
headline: Helping businesses make and accept payments from anywhere in Africa.
description:
At Flutterwave, we are on a mission to build payments infrastructure to connect Africa to the global economy. 

We do this by building technology, tools, and infrastructure for businesses and banks who want to provide a more seamless and secure payments experience for their customers. Founded in 2016 by a team of African finance and technology veterans from Standard Bank, Angela, PayPal, Google Wallet amongst others.

Flutterwave has grown to become one of the fastest growing payments companies in the world. Since inception Flutterwave has processed close to $20 billion in payments and 100 million transactions across over 33 African countries where it currently operates. 

It has attracted significant investment from experienced Fintech investors such as Ycombinator Continuity Fund (investors in Stripe), Greycroft (investors in Braintree and Venmo), Greenvisor Capital, Omidyar Network, and Glynn Capital amongst others. In 2017 Flutterwave was named Africa’s best fintech company at the Apps Africa Innovation Awards.

#### Endless possibilities for all 
Unlocking boundless payment opportunities for enterprises, individuals, small businesses, emerging markets, and startups alike. 
[Contact sales](https://flutterwave.com/</us/contact-sales>)
![SweetPOD](https://cdn.filestackcontent.com/resize=width:1200/output=format:webp/ZKptCGrTTqqljlFDaK20) SweetPOD
![E25 Dresses](https://cdn.filestackcontent.com/resize=width:1100/output=format:webp/zPRSXY8RjGgDMNRsGufB) E25 Dresses
Send money home to loved ones, sell online as a small business, process global payments as an enterprise, build financial products as a startup. With Flutterwave, the question isn't what's possible—it is: what isn't? 
We are trusted by **1 million+** businesses & **2 million+** individuals 
![uber logo](https://flutterwave.com/images/company/uber.svg)
![mtn logo](https://flutterwave.com/images/company/mtn.svg)
![chipper logo](https://flutterwave.com/images/company/chipper.svg)
![piggyvest logo](https://flutterwave.com/images/company/piggyvest.svg)
![wise logo](https://flutterwave.com/images/company/wise.svg)
![microsoft logo](https://flutterwave.com/images/company/microsoft.svg)
![air peace logo](https://flutterwave.com/images/company/air-peace.svg)
##  Endless payment possibilities for enterprises
######  Online Checkout 
Our online checkout features our smart payment ordering system, incredible speed, and beautiful simplicity. It's designed to grow your revenue and provide the best payment experience to your customers. 
[Get started](https://flutterwave.com/</us/checkout>)
![payment phone](https://flutterwave.com/images/sections/checkout.png) Replay
######  Accept payments 
Easily receive money from anyone, anywhere in the world via our multitude of secure payment methods. 
[Learn more ](https://flutterwave.com/</us/collect-payments>)
######  Transfers (Payout) 
Make single or bulk transfers to bank accounts from your Flutterwave dashboard. 
[Learn more ](https://flutterwave.com/</us/send-money>)
##  Endless payment possibilities for every Small Business.
######  Store 
Create a free ecommerce website and start selling worldwide with just a few clicks. 
[Start selling](https://flutterwave.com/</us/store>)
![creator](https://cdn.filestackcontent.com/resize=width:900/output=format:webp/bkgNvkPuRLyYGNqXNFGP)
![creator](https://cdn.filestackcontent.com/resize=width:700/output=format:webp/lc5K7jXVQiS9jBWmcdKg) A platform for you, whether you’re a big business or a solo artist.
######  Invoices 
Generate professional invoices for your customers and get paid from anywhere. 
[Get started ](https://flutterwave.com/</us/invoices>)
######  Payment links 
Receive one-off or recurring payments from anyone, anywhere, via your unique payment link. 
[Learn more ](https://flutterwave.com/</us/payment-links>)
Let’s play to our strengths, shall we? You focus on bringing your amazing ideas to life and we focus on providing all the commerce tools you need. 
[Okay, let’s go](https://flutterwave.com/</us/store>)
##  Endless payment possibilities for every individual
Flutterwave offers a host of seamless products for individuals, ensuring smooth transactions and efficient money management. 
###### Send money to loved ones
Experience the convenience and security of Send, enabling you to effortlessly and securely transfer funds to your beloved ones residing overseas. Begin sharing financial support with the ones who hold significance in your life right [here](https://flutterwave.com/<https:/send.flutterwave.com/>)
###### Shop online
Explore a world of possibilities as you Discover, Shop, and have your purchases conveniently delivered from your cherished online businesses. Embark on a secure shopping journey and relish the joy of acquiring great items from amazing small businesses, right [here](https://flutterwave.com/<https:/flutterwave.market/>)
###### Find events and Buy tickets
Browse upcoming events and secure your ticket on our Afritickets platform [here](https://flutterwave.com/<https:/afritickets.events/>)
##  Well documented and easy-to-use APIs for developers
We have done the core payments integrations and abstractions, so your team can easily integrate with our APIs and access multiple payment functionalities. 
  * Quick transfers 
  * Initiate one-time and recurring payments 
  * Payment verification 
  * Instant virtual cards creation 
  * Customer verification 

[Read the API docs](https://flutterwave.com/<https:/developer.flutterwave.com/docs>)
##  Our global  reach 
##### [30+ Currencies](https://flutterwave.com/<https:/support.flutterwave.com/en/articles/3632719-accepted-currencies>)
We accept payments in more than thirty currencies. 
##### 20M+ API calls
API calls per day, peaking at 231 requests per second. 
##### 500k+ payments daily
Average number of payments processed daily. 
##### 15+ payment options
  * Debit & Credit cards
  * Bank Account
  * Mobile money
  * POS
  * M-Pesa
  * VISA QR
  * Bank Transfer
  * USSD


![globe map](https://flutterwave.com/images/sections/globe.png) ![globe map](https://flutterwave.com/images/sections/globe.png)
#### Ready to get started?
Create an account and instantly start accepting payments, selling your beautiful products online and building financial tools.
[Contact sales ](https://flutterwave.com/</us/contact-sales>)
We use cookies on our website to improve your user experience. You can accept or manage your cookie preferences. To learn more about our use of cookies, [view our detailed Cookie Notice.](https://flutterwave.com/</us/cookies-policy>)
Accept  [ Cookie settings ](https://flutterwave.com/</us/cookie-settings>)
Please be aware that Flutterwave will never ask for your card details, PIN, OTP/token codes, or any account-related information via call, SMS, WhatsApp or email. Please do not respond to such requests.

generated_description:
**Flutterwave: Connecting Africa to the Global Economy**

Founded in 2016 and based in Lagos, Nigeria, Flutterwave has quickly emerged as a frontrunner in the fintech space, specifically in payment solutions for African businesses. The company was established by a team of finance and tech veterans with backgrounds from well-known institutions like Standard Bank, PayPal, and Google Wallet. This impressive pedigree has enabled Flutterwave to craft a robust payments infrastructure that allows businesses across Africa to seamlessly accept and process payments on a global scale.

The mission is clear: **"Helping businesses make and accept payments from anywhere in Africa."** By providing advanced technology and tailored tools, Flutterwave empowers thousands of merchants, ranging from SMEs to large enterprises, to grow their business by simplifying the payments process. 

Flutterwave operates in over 33 African countries and has processed almost **$20 billion** in payments through **100 million transactions** to date. Their solutions include online payment acceptance, cross-border transactions, and point-of-sale systems—all essential in today’s increasingly connected economy. The company has also garnered significant investment from notable fintech investors, including Y Combinator and Greycroft, reinforcing its status in the industry.

With over **500 dedicated employees**, Flutterwave isn't just a payments platform—it's a thriving ecosystem for over **1 million businesses** and **2 million individuals** who rely on it for their financial transactions. From facilitating student tuition payments to enabling effortless money transfers and creating online storefronts, Flutterwave's service offerings are diverse and ever-expanding.

Among its various features are:

- **Online Payments**: Easily accept payments in multiple currencies from customers worldwide.
- **Payouts & Transfers**: Experience hassle-free cross-border payments.
- **Payment Links**: Accept payments without needing to write code.
- **API for Developers**: Comprehensive API documentation makes integration a breeze, supporting capabilities like quick transfers and payment verifications.

Moreover, Flutterwave has been recognized as Africa’s best fintech company at the Apps Africa Innovation Awards in 2017, underscoring its innovative approach and impact in the region.

In an environment where the question isn't "what's possible?" but rather "what isn't possible?", Flutterwave continues to unlock new payment opportunities, contributing to Africa's integration into the global economy. For anyone looking to harness the power of payments across Africa, Flutterwave is a name to remember.

For further details, check out their website: [Flutterwave](https://flutterwave.com).
